extendedInfo.description: Train your memory with this Christian oriented memory game - relaxing fun for children and adults :) Just touch the screen and open a beautiful card from the theme you selected. The cards close when you touch the next card or stay open if you found a pair.If you like the game, please leave a comment :)You will want to play this game again and again not just because of the nice pictures and gameplay but also because at the end of the game you are rewarded with a quote from Bible.Christian Memory game features the following themes:  Jesus Christ, Saints, Symbols. Images in all themes are taken from different Christian traditions: Catholic, Protestant, Orthodox, Anglican, â¦You can play at three difficulty levels:- Easy, 6x3 grid = 9 pairs- Medium, 4x6 grid = 12 pairs- Hard, 4x8 grid = 16 pairsIf you like the game, download full version of Christian Memory from Android Market. It has additional feature of saving highscores and is without ads.This application requires the permission to access internet because of the ad loading. Other than that, it doesn't use internet connection.
